name: Somarouthu Likhita

projects.title: Voice-Based Virtual Assistant
projects.description: This project aims to develop a voice-based virtual assistant that can assist with various tasks on a computer or smart home system. The assistant responds to voice commands and provides functionalities such as launching applications, managing files, sending emails, providing weather updates, and much more.

about:
Hi, I’m Likhita Somarouthu, a Computer Science student with a passion for building intelligent, user-centric digital solutions. I work with modern web and AI technologies like Next.js, Streamlit, and FastAPI, focusing on automation, responsive design, and seamless user experience. I enjoy combining software development with emerging tools in AI to create smart and scalable applications.

Beyond tech, I’m also a professional photographer, videographer, and editor, skilled in capturing and crafting compelling visual stories. My dual interest in technology and creativity helps me bring a balanced and unique approach to everything I build—whether it's code or content.

I'm continuously learning, exploring new tools, and pushing myself to grow in both the tech and creative fields.
